application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 3 (materials), 4 (landscaping) and 7 (SUDS) of planning permission ref. 12211/APP/2020/3220, dated 15-12-2020 (Two x 2-storey, 3-bed dwellings with habitable roof space, parking and amenity space and installation of vehicular crossover involving demolition of existing dwelling)
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate, with the submission of details, that landscaping scheme would successfully preserve and enhance the visual amenities of the locality and provide adequate facilities, failing to comply with policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12, DMHB 14, DMEI 1 and DMT 2 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020) and Policy G5 of the London Plan (2021).

The applicant has failed to demonstrate, with the submission of sufficient details, that the development would provide a satisfactory level of appearance, failing to comply with Policy DMHB 11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).

The applicant has failed to a provide a detailed scheme for the provision of sustainable water management, showing the proposal would not increase the risk of flooding, contrary to Policy DMEI 10 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part Two (2020).
